lead_paragraph: Matt Niskanen scored a goal that wowed the Washington Capitals' bench, and Alex Ovechkin scored an atypical goal that put him in elite company in hockey history.

headline.print_headline: Ovechkin Reaches 30 Goals Again as Capitals Beat Flyers
headline.main: Ovechkin Reaches 30 Goals Again as Capitals Beat Flyers

snippet: Matt Niskanen scored a goal that wowed the Washington Capitals' bench, and Alex Ovechkin scored an atypical goal that put him in elite company in hockey history....
